II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ...  —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ...  —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 704
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
703-B 081463— 353 (2018/11)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ...  —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ...  —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...   735

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2018 fkdjeïn¾ ui 23 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2018 fkdjeïn¾ ui 09 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh  
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 .x.dks ,shkf.a"
 rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2018 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq' - Y%S ,xld bvï f.dvlsÍfï iy ixj¾Okh lsÍfï ixia:d ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 26 jeks Èk      
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
ie' hq'-  2018'10'26 Èk m< jQ wxl 2"095 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  IV ^w& fldgi m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'11'02704  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - ms,eiai
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha ±kg wjqreÿ mylg ^05& fmr wjika ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2019'01'18 jeks Èk 
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
fuu kvqj,g wÞ< hï md¾Yjlrefjl= ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï 
fldgil msgm;la fyda f.dkqlr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï tA i|yd 2019'01'16 jeks Èkg fyda Èkg fmr 
fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ uy;d fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
kshñ; Èkg fmr tjeks b,a,Sula bÈßm;a fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka ish¨ kvq jd¾;d 2019'01'18 jeks 
Èk fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
úkdY lsÍug kshñ; kvq jd¾;d my; ±lafõ'

mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqjl iïmQ¾K iy;sl

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'11'02 735
msial,a úlsŒï
msial,a fjkafoaisfha úlsŒuhs
je,a,jdh Èid wêlrKfha § h
uyck nexl=j'
wxl 75"
Y%Su;a Ñ;a;ïm,ï tA .dâk¾ udj;"
fld<U 02'
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
meñKs,slre'
tÈßj
rdclreKd ú;dk wdrÉÑ,df.a fYdank úmq, jika; 
l=udr"
wxl 19" kj k.rh"
ùrú,'
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
ú;a;slre'
je,a,jdh Èid$ ufyaia;%d;a wêlrKfha j¾I 2017'03'27 Èk m%ldYhg m;a lrk ,o iu: ;Skaÿj m%ldrj tïî39 ork 
kvqj i|yd by; kï i|yka ú;a;slre úiska meñ‚,sldr nexl=jg f.ùug we;s uq¿ uqo, remsh,a mka,laI wiQmkaoyia 
kjish úiaihs Y; wkQyh ^re' 585"920'96& la nj;a" iu:hla f,i tlS uqo, remsh,a oi oyi ^re' 10"000'00& ne.ska jQ 
jdßlj,ska f.jd mshùug o" 2017 wfm%a,a ui isg iEu uilu 30 jeks Èkg fmr f.jd mshùug o" msg msg jdßl 02 la 
fkdf.jk wjia:djl fulS iu:h fkdi,ld yer tf;la f.jQ uqo,a wvq fldg b;sß uqo,a yd Bg wod<j ov fmd,sh o" iuÕ 
fmd,sh o" wh lrjd .ekSug o" weialSis úhoï o ú;a;slref.ka wh lrjd .ekSug o" ú;a;slre tlÕ ù we;;a" tlS uqo,a 
f.ùu ú;a;slre úiska meyer yer we;s neúka tlS uqo, whlr .ekSu i|yd fuu wêlrKh uÕska ksl=;a lr we;s weialSis 
wd{dj m%ldrj ;ykulg f.k we;s fuys my; Wmf,aLKfha iúia;rj olajd we;s ksYaj, foamf,ys tu ú;a;slreg wh;a 
ish¨u ysñlï yd whs;sjdislï"

nj ish,a,kag u fuhska ±kqï fokq ,efí'

ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'
